contest-event.event-date: March 14, 2021 M Midlands Area (Second Section) Midlands Area (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final) From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Second Bedworth Civic Hall, Bedworth, Warwickshire, England, UK Continued uncertainty over COVID-19 sees the 2021 series of regional championship events cancelled.
